bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Zinc-Coated Forged Anchor Shackles
IEEE Draft Standard for Zinc-Coated Forged Anchor Shackles
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC135.62/D9, Jul 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Standard covers the dimensions and strength requirements for Anchor Shackles used in Overhead Transmission and Distribution Line Hardware.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
